pageContext.claim: “Leading members of the Democrat Party have even launched a campaign to abolish ICE.  In other words, they want to abolish America’s borders.”
pageContext.analysis: Leading Democrats have lobbied around the idea of abolishing ICE, but none have suggested they want to "abolish America's borders." Democrats generally do not advocate for illegal immigration, and have repeatedly put forth immigration bills that both include a DACA solution and new border security measures.
